[ Cracking mscash / mscache (DCC2) ]
john --format=mscash2 --wordlist=/opt/Wordlists/famous/rockyou.txt mhash
hashcat -m2100 '$DCC2$10240#daisy#b41c8e6a3875e0dd7793f58af6925d0d' /opt/Wordlists/famous/rockyou.txt --force --potfile-disable
